name: Li Fi
description:
Absorb lightning bolts to replenish your energy as you ward off waves of enemies.

Controls

  • Use "A" and "D" or "Left" and "Right" to move left and right.
  • Use "space" to attack.
  • Use "S" or "Down" to dash.
  • Use "W" or "Up" to block.
  • You can also use a controller.

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
